s.text: Once the ritual becomes a deterrent to the act itself, as it pretty clearly has, it ceases to serve its purpose.
E-voting might actually be a boon to the poor, who often can't miss work to vote as easily as higher-income types can.
Wealthier, whiter people are more likely to vote than poor people and minorities.
